definitions.definition: A feeling of frustration, disappointment, perplexity or embarrassment.
Not very illuminated; dim because of darkness, especially when appearing depressing or frightening.
definitions.example: The cavern was gloomy.

definitions.definition: Suffering from gloom; melancholy; dejected.
definitions.example: a gloomy temper or countenance

definitions.definition: An early keyboard instrument producing a soft sound by means of metal blades (called tangents) attached to the inner ends of the keys gently striking the strings.
A dish of spaghetti with a bolognese sauce.
Of or pertaining to starch.
Containing starch.
Having the quality of fabric starch as applied to fabric; stiff, hard; starched.
Having a starched personality; stiffly formal.
A person who blabs; a tattler; a telltale.
To blather; to talk foolishly or incoherently.
To blab; to reveal a secret.
To stick out one's tongue.
An exchange of goods or services without the use of money.
definitions.example: We had no money so we had to live by barter.

definitions.definition: The goods or services used in such an exchange.
definitions.example: The man used his watch as barter to pay for his tab.

definitions.definition: To exchange goods or services without involving money.
definitions.example: She bartered a bonsai for one of the rare books in my library.

definitions.definition: A circular frill or ruffle on a garment, especially a starched, fluted frill at the neck in Elizabethan and Jacobean England (1560s–1620s).
Anything formed with plaits or flutings like a frill.
Senses relating to animals.
A collar on a shaft or other piece to prevent endwise motion.
An exhibition of haughtiness or pride.
Tumultuous or wanton conduct or procedure.
To shape (fabric, etc.) into a ruff; to adorn (a garment, etc.) with a ruff.
Of a falcon, hawk, etc.: to hit (the prey) without fixing or grabbing hold of it.
To ruffle; to disorder.
Of a bird: to ruffle its feathers.
To boast, to brag.
To speak in a loud and domineering manner; to bluster, to swagger.
Arripis georgianus, a fish found in cool waters off the southern coast of Australia; the Australian herring or tommy ruff.
A bottom-dwelling carnivorous fish of the family Sparidae found in temperate and tropical waters; a porgy or sea bream.
Gymnocephalus cernua, a small Eurasian freshwater fish.
Other species in the same genus.
An instance of ruffing, or an opportunity to ruff, when unable to follow suit.
A game similar to whist and its predecessor.
To play a trump card to a trick when unable to follow suit (that is, to play a card of the same suit as the previous or leading card).
Especially in the form ruff out: to defeat (a card, etc.) by ruffing, thus establishing the master card in the suit led.
A low, vibrating beat of a drum, quieter than a roll; a ruffle.
To beat a ruff or ruffle, as on a drum.
Of a drum, etc.: to have a ruff or ruffle beaten on it.
The bark of a dog; arf, woof.
Not smooth; uneven.
Approximate; hasty or careless; not finished.
definitions.example: a rough estimate; a rough sketch of a building; a rough plan

definitions.definition: Turbulent.
definitions.example: rough sea

definitions.definition: Difficult; trying.
definitions.example: Being a teenager nowadays can be rough.

definitions.definition: Crude; unrefined
definitions.example: His manners are a bit rough, but he means well.

definitions.definition: Violent; not careful or subtle
definitions.example: This box has been through some rough handling.

definitions.definition: Loud and hoarse; offensive to the ear; harsh; grating.
definitions.example: a rough tone; a rough voice

definitions.definition: Not polished; uncut; said of a gem.
definitions.example: a rough diamond

definitions.definition: Harsh-tasting.
definitions.example: rough wine

definitions.definition: Somewhat ill; sick
Unwell due to alcohol; hungover
As part of a set or series.
(of a bathroom etc) Connected to a bedroom.
The topographical boundary dividing two adjacent catchment basins, such as a ridge or a crest.
A region of land within which water flows down into a specified body, such as a river, lake, sea, or ocean; a drainage basin.
A critical point marking a change in course or development.
The time after which material of more adult nature (violence, swear words, sex) may be broadcast on television or radio, either one laid down or one contrived (e.g. when children are not watching)
Serving to mark a significant development, change in direction, etc.
The status of being preeminent, dominant or ascendant.
High importance; superiority.
A virus that specifically infects bacteria.
A minor complaint or problem.
Small, cramped handwriting.
To trifle with; to deceive; to mock.
To use, spend, or do in a petty or trifling manner.
To dwell too much on minor points or on trifling details.
To fidget, fiddle, be restless.
The chemical element (symbol N) with an atomic number of 7 and atomic weight of 14.0067. It is a colorless and odorless gas.
Molecular nitrogen (N2), a colorless, odorless gas at room temperature.
A specific nitrogen within a chemical formula, or a specific isotope of nitrogen
definitions.example: The two nitrogens are located next to one another on the ring.

definitions.definition: The region between the tropics and the temperate latitudes of the world.
A Japanese buckwheat noodle.
A traditional community leader in Angola.
The collective advantages that white people accrue from society, as a result of colonial history etc.
A feat demonstrating brilliance or mastery in a field.
definitions.example: Now orbiting Earth, Gravity Probe B is a technological tour de force.

definitions.definition: An outstanding display of skill.
An educational institution for young children, usually between ages 4 and 6; nursery school.
The elementary school grade before first grade.
The two levels between nursery and prep; the second and third years of preschool.
A hard candy made from butter, brown sugar, syrup and vanilla.
A sauce or syrup made of similar ingredients.
A light brown colour, like that of butterscotch candy.
Of a light brown colour, like that of butterscotch candy.
Having the flavour of butterscotch.
A shrub, Lawsonia inermis, having fragrant reddish flowers
A reddish plant substance, prepared from the dried leaves of this plant, used for temporary tattoos and hair coloring. Hair colorings range from bright red to earth brown to near black.
A rich reddish-brown colour.
To dye or tattoo with henna.
Of a rich reddish-brown colour.
An advocate of imperialism.
Of, or relating to imperialism.
Causing mischief; injurious.
Troublesome, cheeky, badly behaved.
definitions.example: Matthew had a twin brother called Edward, who was always mischievous and badly behaved.

definitions.definition: In the International System of Units, the derived unit of electrical resistance; the electrical resistance of a device across which a potential difference of one volt causes a current of one ampere. Symbol: Ω
Having the lips pressed together.
Unwilling to divulge information.
Any of various pastries based on almond and egg white, traditionally made in France.
A soft biscuit or cookie prepared with almond or coconut dough.
A coarse, rude, low fellow.
Possessing a bold nature.
Energetic, exuberant, or high-strung.
Of or relating to the Goths or their language.
Barbarous, rude, unpolished, belonging to the “Dark Ages”, medieval as opposed to classical.
Of or relating to the architectural style favored in Western Europe in the 12th to 16th centuries, with high-pointed arches, clustered columns, etc.
definitions.example: Gothic arches

definitions.definition: Of or relating to the style of fictional writing associated with the Gothic revival, emphasizing violent or macabre events in a mysterious, desolate setting.
definitions.example: Gothic tales

definitions.definition: Of the name of type formerly used to print, at last, German, also known as black letter.
definitions.example: Gothic letters

definitions.definition: Of a sans serif typeface using straight, even-width lines, also known as grotesque.
Of or relating to the goth subculture, music or lifestyle.
definitions.example: Gothic dress

definitions.definition: Uncertain
definitions.example: I'm still unsure whether to attend the wedding.

definitions.definition: Unstable or precarious
definitions.example: unsure footing

definitions.definition: An activity that takes place before a concert, etc., when the performer and sound crew run through a small portion of the upcoming show on the venue's sound system to verify the volume and tonal frequencies.
An assistant rector or vicar.
A parish priest.
To act as a curator for.
definitions.example: She curated the traveling exhibition.

definitions.definition: To apply selectivity and taste to, as a collection of fashion items or web pages.
To work or act as a curator.
definitions.example: Not only does he curate for the museum, he manages the office and fund-raises.

definitions.definition: An electric device in a kitchen drain that gets rid of food waste by shredding it to tiny bits that can be washed away.
Political, economic and cultural cooperation between nations.
A loanword that occurs in several languages with the same or similar meaning and etymology.
(finish carpentry, interior decorating) A panel, normally made of wood, between the floor and the interior wall of a structure, or placed in a position that is subject to repeated knocks
Any of various green gemstones, especially a green transparent form of beryl, highly valued as a precious stone.
Emerald green, a colour.
Any hummingbird in the genera Chlorostilbon and Elvira; and some in the genus Amazilia
A size of type between nonpareil and minion, standardized as 6½-point.
To ornament with, or as if with, emeralds; to make green.
Of a rich green colour.
Having a bad omen; inauspicious; unlucky.
A style of multi-act theatrical entertainment which originated from France and flourished in Europe and North America from the 1880s through the 1920s.
An entertainment in this style.
It's better to do something late, than to never do it at all.
A mixture of water and soil or fine grained sediment.
A plaster-like mixture used to texture or smooth drywall.
(construction industry slang) Wet concrete as it is being mixed, delivered and poured.
Willfully abusive, even slanderous remarks or claims, notably between political opponents.
definitions.example: The campaign issues got lost in all the mud from both parties.

definitions.definition: Money, dough, especially when proceeding from dirty business.
(gay sex) Stool that is exposed as a result of anal sex.
A particle less than 62.5 microns in diameter, following the Wentworth scale
A black person.
Drilling fluid.
Coffee.
To make muddy or dirty; to apply mud to (something).
To make turbid.
To go under the mud, as an eel does.
To participate in a MUD or multi-user dungeon.
To approach; to arrive, to come forward.
To give one's adhesion; to join up with (a group, etc.); to become part of.
To agree or assent to a proposal or a view; to give way.
To come to an office, state or dignity; to attain, assume (a position).
To become a party to an agreement or a treaty.
A plant belonging to the order Coniferales; a cone-bearing seed plant with vascular tissue, usually a tree.
The most recent and debased of the four or five classical Ages of Man; hence, any period characterised by wicked behaviour.
An age characterised by the use of iron.
A level of culture in which Man used iron and the technology of ironworking. (Estimated to have begun in Europe about 1100 BCE)

A class period, usually in boarding school or high school, where students are afforded the time for independent study and homework assignments, as part of the curriculum or after hours, the last notably as a punishment called detention.
definitions.example: He finished drafting his essay in study hall.

definitions.definition: The classroom or other school hall used for such a purpose.
definitions.example: The supervising teacher's stern expression at the front of the drab study hall left little doubt that no nonsense would be tolerated there.

definitions.definition: A cut made in the lower part of something; the material so removed.
The notch cut in a tree to direct its fall when being felled.
The underside of a sirloin of beef; the fillet.
A hairstyle that is shaved or clipped short on the sides and kept long on the top.
A blow dealt upward.
To sell (something) at a lower price, or to work for lower wages, than a competitor.
To create an overhang by cutting away material from underneath.
To undermine.
To strike a heavy blow upward.
Produced by undercutting.
Designed so as to cut from the underside.
Having the parts in relief cut under.
The infield defensive player that stands between the second baseman and the third baseman.
definitions.example: The shortstop ranged deep into the hole to make the stop.

definitions.definition: A nimble defender.
definitions.example: I'll play shortstop when we make our proposal.

definitions.definition: A player who is short of money.
A biomedical therapy for severely depressed patients in which a brief electric current is sent through the brain of an anesthetized patient.
definitions.example: The therapeutic effects of low and high energy electroconvulsive therapies are quite different.

definitions.definition: The use of a single, very large dose of a medicine
Government policy of sudden release of price controls and immediate trade liberalization within a country.
Cloudy diffused matter such as mist, steam or fumes suspended in the air.
The gaseous state of a substance that is normally a solid or liquid.
Something insubstantial, fleeting, or transitory; unreal fancy; vain imagination; idle talk; boasting.
Any medicinal agent designed for administration in the form of inhaled vapour.
(in the plural) Hypochondria; melancholy; the blues; hysteria, or other nervous disorder.
Wind; flatulence.
To become vapor; to be emitted or circulated as vapor.
To turn into vapor.
definitions.example: to vapor away a heated fluid

definitions.definition: To emit vapor or fumes.
To use insubstantial language; to boast or bluster.
To give (someone) the vapors; to depress, to bore.
To give birth to or produce (as its female parent) a child. (Compare father.)
To treat as a mother would be expected to treat her child; to nurture.
To cause to contain mother.
definitions.example: mothered oil / vinegar / wine

definitions.definition: (of an alcohol) To develop mother.
The nurturing of a child by its mother.
The protective behaviour of a mother towards her child.
Nurturing or protective behaviour reminiscent of that performed by a literal mother.
Shortened form of a-mothering ; practice of visiting one's literal or figurative mother or mother church (compare Mothering Sunday).
Frustrated, annoyed, tired.
definitions.example: After two days, I am fed up with this nonsense.

definitions.definition: To feed (a person or animal) until they are at a healthy weight.
A courtyard behind a housing block or tenement building.
A team's defensive half of the court; the part of the court where the other team's basket is located, or the guards playing in that area.
Something that is published once a year.
Happening once every year.
definitions.example: Christmas is a yearly celebration.

definitions.definition: Once a year.
Every year.
The act or solemnity of crowning a sovereign; the act of investing a prince with the insignia of royalty, on his succeeding to the sovereignty.
A success in the face of little or no opposition.
The process of giving birth; pregnancy and parturition
Of, pertaining to, or suitable for childbirth
The position of a ship laid on one side.
To heave a ship down on one side so as to expose the other, in order to clean it of barnacles and weed, or to repair it below the water line.
To tilt on one side.
To lurch or sway violently from side to side.
To tilt or lean while in motion.
(chiefly US) To career, to move rapidly straight ahead, to rush carelessly.
(chiefly US) To move swiftly and in an uncontrolled way.
A heavy garment worn over other clothes, for protection from cold or weather.
To apply an exterior coating to.
Someone who takes a day trip.
A structure made by stacking playing cards in a pyramidal fashion.
(by extension) Any structure with alternating vertical and horizontal layers.
A structure or argument built on a shaky foundation.
The location of low tide in a coastal area.
The lowest stage of a river.
Favorable; benevolent.
definitions.example: propitious weather

definitions.definition: Advantageous.
Characteristic of a good omen.
Favorably disposed towards someone.
Any substance produced by one tissue and conveyed by the bloodstream to another to effect physiological activity.
A synthetic compound with the same activity.
Any similar substance in plants.
To treat with hormones.
Not broadcast on radio or television.
Pertaining to a radio or television station that is completely shut down.
An inclined surface that connects two levels; an incline.
A road that connects a freeway to a surface street or another freeway.
A mobile staircase that is attached to the doors of an aircraft at an airport
A large parking area in an airport for aircraft, for loading and unloading or for storage (see also apron)
A construction used to do skating tricks, usually in the form of part of a pipe.
A speed bump.
A leap or bound.
A concave bend at the top or cap of a railing, wall, or coping; a romp.
To behave violently; to rage.
To spring; to leap; to bound, rear, or prance; to move swiftly or violently.
To climb, like a plant; to creep up.
To stand in a rampant position.
To (cause to) change value, often at a steady rate.
To adapt a piece of iron to the woodwork of a gate.
An American plant, Allium tricoccum, related to the onion; a wild leek.
A promiscuous man or woman; a general insult for a worthless person.
A stylised Japanese form of wrestling in which a wrestler loses if he is forced from the ring, or if any part of his body except the soles of his feet touches the ground.
A rikishi (sumo wrestler)
The state or quality of being strict.
definitions.example: Discipline calls for a certain strictness.

definitions.definition: The result or product of being strict.
To boil to such an extent as to overflow its container.
definitions.example: I forgot about the rice and it boiled over.

definitions.definition: (of anger, etc.) To reach the point where aggressive action is taken.
Unrestrained by morality.
Recklessly abandoned to sensual pleasures.
A production technique, in which pictures are accompanied by the voice of an unseen actor or reporter.
A voice-overed release, especially of foreign content.
The voice audio track of such a broadcast.
To supply the voice audio track for (a broadcast).
